comments: Professor Wilson\'s methods may seem unconventional at first, but they are effective. The information that you learn in this class will be very useful throughout life, no matter what field you go into.

bobby ray is where it\'s at. he;s a great teacher and he uses one useful method if you do not like this class and do not excel in in it also then you must not speak English or do not believe in going to class.
The funniest teacher ive ever had! really laid back, and a cool guy. Easy A, covers one thing and one thing only the wilson approach!
l

Everything is an Argument. I received an A for his course. He\'s more like a word-wizard when it comes to rhetoric. The Wilson Approach works. My only suggestion is that one should read his published narratives prior to registering.

It is a fun and enjoyable class it is easy and he is fun to listen to.That is until he gets to actual teaching. He is all over the place and always shouts out The Wilson approach! which is useless. I still do not know what that is that was the purpose of his class. Horrible Teacher doesn\'t know what he is doing so don\'t waste your time and money.

He\'s a really laid back guy...his lectures are different than the normal english class but they get the student really involved. The topics of discussion get you thinking and help your ability to argue a lot. I\'ve learned a ton from this guy and the work isn\'t too hard either. Definitely recommend Wilson.

I thought Mr. Wilson was a cool guy. However his lectures was all over the place. Some days we wouldnt even have lecture just talk. He does like to joke around alot. He\'s an easy A, but doesnt grade on time till end of semester, homework is nsubmitted online. Other than that he has a weird personality.

Although Prof. Wilson can be a bit absentminded he is one of the the greatist professors I ever had because he tought me how to think agian,something i am very greatful for. Unlike a lot of people in his profession he cares about the students who care about learning. You have to put the effort in if you want to learn. Everything is a sale ;).

He is a terrible teacher. He doesn\'t really teach anything, and half the time he\'s just rambling to fill up time in the class so it looks like he\'s an actual professor. He\'s not easy to get ahold of and he is big on choosing favorites. Basically if your not his favorite you have no chance of getting an A. He\'s terrible.

He doesn\'t teach what would be considered an "average" English class so it will take some time to figure the class (and him) out. Once you do, the class gives good insight on how to further enhance writing ability and the theory behind your writing in general. As a person he\'s easy to get along with. Take his class for a new look on English.

This teacher is honestly the most awful teacher I\'ve ever had. Almost every class, I sit there in disbelief that I spend my hard earned money to take it. Prof Wilson is extremely unclear with assignments and he avoids answering questions at all costs it seems! He jokes around WAY too much. He is a joke; honestly I hate to say this but it\'s true.
BEST TEACHER IN THE WORLD. He is easy and knows what he is talking about. and my ARGUMENT for you haters is how can you be negative on him when his class is easy if you do his work?

ok...prof. wilson is probably the best teacher i ever had. he helped me learn how to be a confident writer again...the willson approach works...not many assignments..he opens up your mind at so many levels...as long as u show initiative he\'ll be your pal n help u out..cant fail his class unless ur an idiot love u mr wilson!!

"everything is an argument" thats what you\'ll hear him say first...this class was not even an english class its more of a philosophy class..i honestly took nothing out of this class and he is SO UNCLEAR about the whole course..he changed our final like 3 weeks before it was due which was BS..he is honestly a sad excuse for a teacher.DO NOT TAKE HIM

Ahh professor Wilson,I love him! He\'s a poet, a feminist, a singer (albeit poorly), a really fun teacher and a guy that tries to make you work without feeling like you\'re working. TAKE HIS CLASS ABOVE ANY OTHERS, you won\'t regret it!

Professor Wilson is hilarious. If you want a relaxed class, this is the one to join. However when it comes to being ontime for class, that is not something he does well. He is unpredictable yet flexible. Plus for girls hes quite the looker.
dude speaks da truth. He finna smash on all yo english teachers cirriculums!! he takin teachin to a whole nutha level. one love!
Sickest teacher if all time. End of story
horrible teacher. guy didn\'t even come to class on time or collected our papers that were "suppose" to be do. make us waste are time doing them and then not even grading them.
